interpretation: The "sunglasses" card represents a sense of mystery and hidden intentions. It suggests that the person or situation you are dealing with may not be entirely transparent, and you should proceed with caution. It could also indicate a need to protect yourself from harmful influences or to maintain a cool, detached demeanor in a difficult situation. Keywords associated with this card include secrecy, aloofness, protection, and ambiguity. Trust your instincts and don't be afraid to ask questions or dig deeper to uncover the truth. Remember that things may not always be as they appear on the surface.
